question: Which of the following is the main objective of Parliamentary Language Committee?
option1: Recommend on making the progressive use of the Hindi language for the official purposes of the union
option2: Looking into the linguistic demands for new states and make suggestions in that regard
option3: Identify the endangered languages and make recommendations to protect and preserve them
option4: Examine the vernacular education and make recommendations for effective implementation of three language formula
answer: Recommend on making the progressive use of the Hindi language for the official purposes of the union
explanation: Article 344: initially at 5 years of commencement of constitution and thereafter every 10 years, the President will constitute Parliamentary Language Committee to recommend on making the progressive use of the Hindi language for the official purposes of the union.
